attributes.action: Extend theory tests by 6 months once test centres reopen!
attributes.additional_details:
I want the government to extent theory tests as I find it unfair as MOTS have been extended by 6months but theory tests aren’t. 
This is difficult for anyone who is trying to book a test once test centres are back open again.
attributes.background: Extent theory tests by 6months as people who have booked driving tests are getting them cancelled but their theory tests are running out at the end of the year or beginning of next year.
